Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I am shark4558,this is my first post in the forum,

I started playing ksp in version 0.21, then went to version 1.0.2, so I learned a lot from the game, but still I have not done anything important ...

but I'm planning to do tutorials and a mission ....

I am now using version 1.0.4

By the way, I built a "70 ton spaceplane" which does not reach the space, due to the weight ...

If someone needs help with

the game, let me know, by the way, I do not connect to internet many times (no internet at home) but i will be available .

(google translator was translating some words erroneously, so I had to correct it and dont know if it got worse...)

Edited September 17, 2015 by Shark4558
forget to put the current version

Hello Shark4558, and welcome to the forums!

There are many, many threads about how to build and fly spaceplanes in the Gameplay Questions section of the forums.

You should definitely update to the current version of the game, which is 1.0.4.

Happy landings!

You should definitely update to the current version of the game, which is 1.0.4.

Happy landings!

Sorry Starhawk,I forgot to say that I was using the version 1.0.4...im going to edit that now.

and thanks,Happy Landings for you too!
